GeneDef.label: explosive blows
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can create a charge that will be released the next time the pawn attacks something in melee combat to cause damage to the target, all hostile pawns near the target, and nearby objects.

GeneDef.label: instant recharge
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can convert large amounts of radiation into electricity and store it in a battery.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This ability will try to consume half of the pawn's stored radiation.

GeneDef.label: limitless potential
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can inject a little bit of radiation into a pawn's brain to permanently enhance their mental capabilities.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Takes about 2 years of repeated casting on a pawn to reach 100% enlightenment.
Each use has about a 10% chance of causing the target to develop carcinoma some time during the next 24 hours. Radiomancer's and non-senescent pawns do not have this risk.

GeneDef.label: nuclear winter
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can release large amounts of energy up into the atmosphere to cause the local area to experience a cold snap for an entire quadrum. This ability won't work if there is a heat wave, cold snap, or other similar condition already active.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This ability can be used within an enemy map to attempt to cause things like hypothermia, or your own map to create a naturally cold environment for a time.

GeneDef.label: detonation
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can create a blast of energy containing half of currently stored radiation, with higher radiation levels causing more destruction to objects and hostile pawns.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This ability consumes half of the pawn's stored radiation.

GeneDef.label: ashes to ashes
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can use a bit of radioactive energy to trigger spontaneous combustion in an area.

customEffectDescriptions.li: In the event that no flammable things are found, the energy is just wasted.

GeneDef.label: dust to dust
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can use a massive amount of radiation to instantly vaporize a biological being.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This ability won't leave much loot for you, but it'll kill things.
In some cases this will also destroy the item the target is standing on/near as well.

GeneDef.label: i am become death
GeneDef.description: Radiomancers with this gene can create a burst of energy containing every bit of radiation currently stored, with higher radiation levels causing a lot more destruction.

customEffectDescriptions.li: This ability consumes all of the pawn's stored radiation.
